title: POOL PARTY AHRI
body:
http://i.imgur.com/UBfc1Gu.jpg[/img]

Would you want this? It doesn't have to be that kind of swimsuit. I'm just talking about the idea in general. Please take the time to vote if you can. 

It doesn't even have to be pool party. Just a summer themed Ahri sounds fun.  Her orb would be a beach ball :^)

replies.body: topless
I just face-palmed so hard it echoed... oww ;__;
I hear if this gets a million up votes it gets added into the game.

As if people need more Ahri fap material.









That said, I still voted yes.
well said

why the hell not?
Most of players love it. Well there's a few that against sexualization of game characters, but it's not that much.

as said before, her Q could become beach ball. The other skills could take some make up.
STOP THE SEXUALIZATION OF GAME CHARACTERS ---->  {{champion:6}}
Urgot's nipples are way too sexy, remove them rito.
yo speaking of sexualization have you seen gragas jugs?

No.

Ahri's outfit is skimpy enough as it is, no reason to make an even sluttier skin.

I have more respect for champions that actually dress properly, like {{champion:10}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:254}} 

Champs wearing little more than tiny skirts/workout bra's like {{champion:28}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:103}} are truly the problem with this game.
Yeah, I agree. With someone like Ahri I can understand, but Caitlyn? Respectable sheriff in a miniskirt? Who the hell thought of that idea?
Ironically, although Ahri's lore actually says she seduced men, she has the most conservative outfit out of all of those others.
It shows enough to be seductive, cover enough to let imagination run wild.Its what we cant see that excite us, same way women in lingerie are hotter than once thats just flat out naked

Remember ladies, your bodies are shameful and should be covered up so as to not distract boys.
 ~Uiru

> Remember ladies, your bodies are~~ shameful ~~  sexy and should be covered up so as to not ~~distract~~ harden boys.
~Uiru
>

Man, that cute girl in class with the yoga pants that was seated ahead of me was a pain everytime I had to stand up ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

As mentioned before, putting a champ in a bikini isn't a skin, although it is Ahri and is very hawt. True, it would sell, seeing as what the playerbase is made up of and what they want in their skins, but it isnt much of a skin.

Lots of other options out there that make for better pool party skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Om1God,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4PKuXLE,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-03-05T05:46:26.629+0000)
>
> As mentioned before, putting a champ in a bikini isn't a skin, although it is Ahri and is very hawt. True, it would sell, seeing as what the playerbase is made up of and what they want in their skins, but it isnt much of a skin.
> 
> Lots of other options out there that make for better pool party skins.

Oh there will be skin ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Om1God,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4PKuXLE,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-03-05T05:46:26.629+0000)
>
> As mentioned before, putting a champ in a bikini isn't a skin

But putting them in trunks is?
What do you call Battle bunny riven then? It's riven in a bunny suit that is quite frankly the same as a one piece swimsuit + tights.
The orb would be a beach ball
...you know, thinking about it, wouldn't that be more of a Syndra thing?
Shoudn't she be holding dodge balls?
I think volleyballs. Still beach-y, but with more pain involved. :x

> [{quoted}](name=Jackie Papercut,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4PKuXLE,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-03-05T09:07:10.007+0000)
>
> ...you know, thinking about it, wouldn't that be more of a Syndra thing?

So suddenly other champions can't have orb particles changed because only Syndra can have that? Stupid logic.
I want everyone to have a pool party skin. *Everyone*.

> [{quoted}](name=BodkinsOdds,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4PKuXLE,comment-id=002b,timestamp=2015-03-06T00:42:34.886+0000)
>
> I want everyone to have a pool party skin. *Everyone*.

Pool Party Urgot plz
HOTS is making a Beach Party Stitches skin. It's their FIRST beach party skin, too!

Q can be an orb of water.
W can be droplets of water instead of three individual flames.
E will remain unchanged for clarity sake (Her E is the same for all her skins)
R can make the sound of someone 'dashing' through water instead of it's default sound.

Rather simple changes but I feel like they're still exciting and give the pool party effect the other skins give. Would buy 10/10.
I voted yes because she is in the pool party splash art already and I would love to see more skins. That being said, I would love a pool party Zac (:
Needs more skin.
I'm surprised Riot hasn't done some version of Pool Party Ahri by now.  That seems like it'd sell big time.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4PKuXLE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-05T03:57:48.957+0000)
>
> I'm surprised Riot hasn't done some version of Pool Party Ahri by now.  That seems like it'd sell big time.

What could you do with her? Putting a champ in a bikini is not a skin.

A. It actually is,
B. She might not necessarily be in a bikini per se, and
C. Even if it weren't, it'd sell like water bottles in the Sahara.
10/10 would use this skin... her orb could be like a ball of water or something it would be amazing
So I can angrily fight Syndra with the same style
We need a pool party Nasus, Varus, Thresh, and Diana to accompany this.
Of those, only Thresh really feels like he's got anything special going for him, throwing a life preserver with Dark Passage and creating a wave with Flay.
Just think about grumpy Diana hiding under the umbrella covered in way too much sun screen. Think about it!

tl;dr

~~WHO WANTS TO SEEM DEM TITTIES!~~
I mean, " Just a summer themed Ahri sounds fun."

Meh. Ahri, in lore, is a better tease than that. 

I mean, look at pool party Leona. It's quite a tasteful skin, compared to a lot. This is just, well, demeaning. I'd rather see something like Vampire Ahri or something with a more seductive, but deadly appearance to fit her.
This is hardly tastless compared to what most people draw for Pool Party Ahri. It's also an exact copy of what she's wearing in the background of Pool Party Ziggs' splash.
I gotta ask, where the heck are her nipples? Like, her right boob is hardly even inside the suit. At least make it realistic.

> [{quoted}](name=Mast3rMahan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4PKuXLE,comment-id=0027,timestamp=2015-03-05T21:42:06.017+0000)
>
> I gotta ask, where the heck are her nipples? Like, her right boob is hardly even inside the suit. At least make it realistic.

Sorry I drew this a long time ago and I tried to get it out ASAP while pool party was popular.
IMO Next Pool Party Series should be Ahri, Syndra, Riven, Talon, Yasuo
With some nice, hard volleyballs for Syndra to throw, 'cause *god* those can hurt.
More like Sona Pool Party, but yes Ahri would be nice

I like the goggles a lot. They work well on Ahri.

The suit...eh. It would be neat if she wore something that reflected the *kumiho* roots in her lore, but I don't exactly know anything about Korean fashion or themes (even my East Asian history classes nearly ignore poor Korea).

Actually more than anything, I would prefer to see a "hunted" Ahri, dressed out in heavy concealing raggety cloaks.

Given the nature of her soul sucking escapades I'm really surprised they haven't brought out the pitchforks and torches.

Pool Party Ahri? Yes! Playboy Ahri? Please no. 

Yes, I'm a guy. And yes I like girls. No, I do not want to see this skin.

Really, it's not just guys that play this game. I realize this isn't true of everyone, but I think this skin would make a lot of girls who play League uncomfortable.

It's more than just "cover up your shameful nipples, woman," or something like that. It's a maturity thing. A man should be able to look at a woman and see more than boobs. 

Or at least, if Riot's going to sexualize characters, they should sexualize male characters, too. Nothing-but-codpiece Braum and asymmetrical manthong Graves anyone? Or maybe we could give Lucian another skin that not only emphasizes his (ahem) better features, but also allows him to still be black! Eh?
We could even make it a Cards Against Humanity joke. BBD Lucian!
